text: Pope Marinus could refer to: *Pope Marinus I (882-884) *Pope Marinus II (942-946) Because of similarity of the names Marinus and Martinus, these 2 popes were erroneously referred to later as Martinus II and Martinus III respectively. As a result, Simon de Brion, the next Pope Martinus, took the name Martinus IV instead of Martinus II. ==See also== *Pope Martin (disambiguation) Marinus
title: Pope Marinus
